title: What is the average wage in Bratislava? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to the Statistical Office of the Slovak Republic, the average nominal monthly wage recorded in Bratislavský kraj (the Greater Bratislava region) in the 1st quarter of 2014 was 1,098 EUR. The average nominal wage for the entire Slovakia amounted to 821 EUR. Hence, the income in Bratislava region is about 133.7% of the national average.  However, it is worth noting that except Bratislavský kraj, none of the regions reached the average country-wide figure. Therefore, there are vast disparities between the gross (and presumably also net) income in the capital city region and the rest of the country. Note Below: If your gross wage as an employee in Bratislava is a rounded average of 1,100 EUR, you can expect your net monthly pay to amount to 832 EUR. Source(s): Average monthly wage of an employee in economy of the SR in the 1st quarter of 2014 Výpočet - danovakalkulacka.sk
